entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this afternoon then clearing. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
